metadata.name: Live Memory Dump Using Powershell
metadata.comment: Detects usage of a PowerShell command to dump the live memory of a Windows machine

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-storagediagnosticinfo')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-includelivedump')))

output.summary: Detects usage of a PowerShell command to dump the live memory of a Windows machine
